verses.verse: The same <WG1565> day <WG2250> went <WG1831> Jesus <WG2424> out of <WG575> the <WG3588> house, <WG3614> and <WG2532> sat <WG2521> by <WG3844> the <WG3588> sea side. <WG2281>

And <WG2532> great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> were gathered together <WG4863> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> so that <WG5620> he <WG846> went <WG1684> into <WG1519> a ship, <WG4143> and sat; <WG2521> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> whole <WG3956> multitude <WG3793> stood <WG2476> on <WG1909> the <WG3588> shore. <WG123>
And <WG2532> he spake <WG2980> many things <WG4183> unto them <WG846> in <WG1722> parables, <WG3850> saying, <WG3004> Behold, <WG2400> a sower <WG4687> went forth <WG1831> to sow; <WG4687>

And <WG2532> when he <WG846> sowed, <WG4687> some <WG3739> <WG3303> seeds fell <WG4098> by <WG3844> the <WG3588> way side, <WG3598> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> fowls <WG4071> came <WG2064> and <WG2532> devoured them up: <WG2719> <WG846>

<WG1161> Some <WG243> fell <WG4098> upon <WG1909> stony places, <WG4075> where <WG3699> they had <WG2192> not <WG3756> much <WG4183> earth: <WG1093> and <WG2532> forthwith <WG2112> they sprung up, <WG1816> because they had <WG2192> no <WG3361> deepness <WG899> of earth: <WG1093>
And <WG1161> when the sun <WG2246> was up, <WG393> they were scorched; <WG2739> and <WG2532> because they had <WG2192> no <WG3361> root, <WG4491> they withered away. <WG3583>
And <WG1161> some <WG243> fell <WG4098> among <WG1909> thorns; <WG173> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> thorns <WG173> sprung up, <WG305> and <WG2532> choked <WG638> them: <WG846>

But <WG1161> other <WG243> fell <WG4098> into <WG1909> good <WG2570> ground, <WG1093> and <WG2532> brought forth <WG1325> fruit, <WG2590> some <WG3739> <WG3303> a hundredfold, <WG1540> <WG1161> some <WG3739> sixtyfold, <WG1835> <WG1161> some <WG3739> thirtyfold. <WG5144>

<WG1161> He <WG3588> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> Because <WG3754> it is given <WG1325> unto you <WG5213> to know <WG1097> the <WG3588> mysteries <WG3466> of the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of heaven, <WG3772> but <WG1161> to them <WG1565> it is not <WG3756> given. <WG1325>

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3748> hath, <WG2192> to him <WG846> shall be given, <WG1325> and <WG2532> he shall have more abundance: <WG4052> but <WG1161> whosoever <WG3748> hath <WG2192> not, <WG3756> from <WG575> him <WG846> shall be taken away <WG142> even <WG2532> that <WG3739> he hath. <WG2192>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> speak <WG2980> I to them <WG846> in <WG1722> parables: <WG3850> because <WG3754> they seeing <WG991> see <WG991> not; <WG3756> and <WG2532> hearing <WG191> they hear <WG191> not, <WG3756> neither <WG3761> do they understand. <WG4920>

And <WG2532> in <WG1909> them <WG846> is fulfilled <WG378> the <WG3588> prophecy <WG4394> of Isaiah, <WG2268> which saith, <WG3004> By hearing <WG189> ye shall hear, <WG191> and <WG2532> shall not <WG3364> understand; <WG4920> and <WG2532> seeing <WG991> ye shall see, <WG991> and <WG2532> shall not <WG3364> perceive: <WG1492>

For <WG1063> this <WG5127> people's <WG2992> heart <WG2588> is waxed gross, <WG3975> and <WG2532> their ears <WG3775> are dull of hearing, <WG191> <WG917> and <WG2532> their <WG848> eyes <WG3788> they have closed; <WG2576> lest at any time <WG3379> they should see <WG1492> with their eyes, <WG3788> and <WG2532> hear <WG191> with their ears, <WG3775> and <WG2532> should understand <WG4920> with their heart, <WG2588> and <WG2532> should be converted, <WG1994> and <WG2532> I should heal <WG2390> them. <WG846>
But <WG1161> blessed <WG3107> are your <WG5216> eyes, <WG3788> for <WG3754> they see: <WG991> and <WG2532> your <WG5216> ears, <WG3775> for <WG3754> they hear. <WG191>

For <WG1063> verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> That <WG3754> many <WG4183> prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> righteous <WG1342> men have desired <WG1937> to see <WG1492> those things which <WG3739> ye see, <WG991> and <WG2532> have not <WG3756> seen <WG1492> them; and <WG2532> to hear <WG191> those things which <WG3739> ye hear, <WG191> and <WG2532> have not <WG3756> heard <WG191> them.

When any one <WG3956> heareth <WG191> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of the <WG3588> kingdom, <WG932> and <WG2532> understandeth <WG4920> it not, <WG3361> then cometh <WG2064> the <WG3588> wicked <WG4190> one, and <WG2532> catcheth away <WG726> that which was sown <WG4687> in <WG1722> his <WG846> heart. <WG2588> This <WG3778> is <WG2076> he which received seed <WG4687> by <WG3844> the <WG3588> way side. <WG3598>

Yet <WG1161> hath <WG2192> he not <WG3756> root <WG4491> in <WG1722> himself, <WG1438> but <WG235> endureth for a while: <WG2076> <WG4340> for <WG1161> when tribulation <WG2347> or <WG2228> persecution <WG1375> ariseth <WG1096> because <WG1223> of the <WG3588> word, <WG3056> by and by <WG2117> he is offended. <WG4624>

He also that received seed <WG4687> <WG1161> among <WG1519> the <WG3588> thorns <WG173> <WG3778> is <WG2076> he that heareth <WG191> the <WG3588> word; <WG3056> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> care <WG3308> of this <WG5127> world, <WG165> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> deceitfulness <WG539> of riches, <WG4149> choke <WG4846> the <WG3588> word, <WG3056> and <WG2532> he becometh <WG1096> unfruitful. <WG175>

Another <WG243> parable <WG3850> put he forth <WG3908> unto them, <WG846> saying, <WG3004> The <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is likened unto <WG3666> a man <WG444> which sowed <WG4687> good <WG2570> seed <WG4690> in <WG1722> his <WG848> field: <WG68>

But <WG1161> while men <WG444> slept, <WG2518> his <WG846> enemy <WG2190> came <WG2064> and <WG2532> sowed <WG4687> tares <WG2215> among <WG303> <WG3319> the <WG3588> wheat, <WG4621> and <WG2532> went his way. <WG565>

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> the <WG3588> blade <WG5528> was sprung up, <WG985> and <WG2532> brought forth <WG4160> fruit, <WG2590> then <WG5119> appeared <WG5316> the <WG3588> tares <WG2215> also. <WG2532>
